keyTakeAways: The remains found behind an abandoned school in Philadelphia are identified as belonging to Kada Scott, a 23-year-old woman who had been missing for about two weeks.
An anonymous tip prompted authorities to re-examine the site, leading to the discovery of a shallow grave where Scott’s remains were found.
DNA testing confirmed the identity of the remains, providing definitive evidence linking them to Kada Scott.
Keon King, 21, of Dover, Delaware, has been arrested and charged with kidnapping, stalking, and other offenses related to Scott’s disappearance.
Prosecutors allege that King had cellphone contact with Scott and that a stolen vehicle found in a fire was used in connection with her disappearance.
Cellphone location data and video evidence are being used to support the case against King.
District Attorney Larry Krasner stated that homicide charges are likely but are being pursued only in accordance with legal procedures.
There is ongoing investigation into whether others were involved in the incident after Scott’s disappearance.
King was previously arrested in a similar case involving a kidnapping and assault, but charges were dropped due to lack of court appearances by victims and witnesses.
Kada Scott, who worked in a nursing home, was described by her parents as a person of 'light, kindness and beautiful spirit,' and they expressed deep emotional pain over her loss.

summaryOfNewsArticle: The remains of Kada Scott, a 23-year-old woman missing for about two weeks, were found in a shallow grave behind an abandoned school in Philadelphia. DNA testing confirmed her identity. Authorities were guided by an anonymous tip that prompted a re-examination of the site, where the remains were discovered. Keon King, a 21-year-old man from Dover, Delaware, has been arrested and charged with kidnapping, stalking, and other crimes. Prosecutors allege that King had cell phone contact with Scott and used a stolen vehicle linked to her disappearance. Video evidence and location data support the case. While homicide charges are being considered, District Attorney Larry Krasner emphasizes adherence to legal procedures. An investigation into possible involvement of other individuals is ongoing. Scott, who worked in a nursing home, was described by her parents as a source of kindness and light, and their grief is widely acknowledged.
title: Remains found behind abandoned school belong to missing Philadelphia woman, Kada Scott, officials say
